articles.author: Julie Bort
articles.title: After causing outrage on the first day of Y Combinator, AI code editor PearAI lands $1M seed - TechCrunch
articles.description: On the first day of Y Combinator the founders of PearAI got “cancelled." They used the hate to launch a new product, raise $1 million.
articles.content: On the first day of Y Combinator’s winter 2024 session right after orientation and a photo in front of the YC sign the founders of PearAI got canceled, as founder Nang Ang described it to TechCrunch,… [+2612 chars]
